for_card: Perfect for certified divers looking for a short underwater escape.
text_card: Enjoy two exhilarating boat dives exploring diverse underwater landscapes. The package includes full scuba diving gear, snacks, soft drinks, a knowledgeable guide, and a small group setting with a maximum of 4 people per guide.

for_card: Ideal for adventurous divers seeking a more extensive underwater experience.
text_card: Embark on a five-dive expedition to explore various dive sites with different marine life and underwater features. The package includes top-notch scuba diving equipment, delicious snacks, refreshing soft drinks, an experienced guide, and a small group atmosphere with a maximum of 4 divers per guide.

for_card: For avid divers looking for the ultimate underwater adventure.
text_card: Dive enthusiasts will love our 10-dive marathon, exploring a variety of spectacular dive sites. The package includes full scuba gear, delightful snacks, unlimited soft drinks, an expert guide, and a personalized experience with a maximum of 4 divers per guide.
